attributes.action: stop paying mp,s second home alowences and other expences the public are having reductions in local services lets start from the top
attributes.additional_details:
i want the government to set a exsample they are bring in new ways they the public reciave housing benfit ,ie reducing it by 15% if they have one bedroom unoccupied 25% for two in social housing ,i was made redundant in may and got a part time job so i did not have to go on benfits i recaive housing benefits because i earn a low wage but if this is being brought into law i will be worse off just becuse i have a empty room and i am not prepard to move to a smaller property this is outrageous .yes there are not a lot of social housing but this is the governments fault not ordinary working mans.
so i think that all government officails ie mp,s local officiels should have there expences reduced or even stopped .single out the poorest of society this just does not work out i go to work pay my travel i even pay towards my rent and the government proposes this scandelous reform time to change and stop mp,s second home and reant allowences and travel.
